short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome screen sharing extension for the ConexED platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your full desktop or select an application window to share.  (Note:  others will be able to see a higher resolution of your shared application if your application's window is smaller than full screen.  Application windows sized around 800x400 work best.)
